Control.Name: Window1
Control.Tooltip: The number of cards in your collection, excluding duplicates

Control.Name: Window2
Control.Tooltip: The total number of cards in your collection, including duplicates

Control.Name: ChallengeButton
Control.Tooltip: Challenge an opponent to a game of Cards!

Control.Name: CollectionButton
Control.Tooltip: View your card collection.

Control.Name: Art
Control.Tooltip: View your card collection.

Control.Name: OptionsButton
Control.Tooltip: View and alter various options.

Control.Name: StatsButton
Control.Tooltip: View various statistics of your game play.

Control.Name: PlayersButton
Control.Tooltip: View other players who may be up for a game.

Control.Name: ID
Control.Tooltip: Card number 001

Control.Name: Quality
Control.Tooltip: This card is junk quality

Control.Name: NumberOwned
Control.Tooltip: You own 9 copies of this card

Control.Name: FilterChallengesButton
Control.Tooltip: Prevents other players from issuing challenges to you.

Control.Name: Text
Control.Tooltip: Silent mode will prevent all communications from the addon, and will appear to other players as if you don't even have it installed. You will be unable to challenge other players, or view statistics or collections.

Control.Name: FilterChallengesButton1
Control.Tooltip: Prevents other players from issuing challenges to you.

Control.Name: FilterChallengesButton2
Control.Tooltip: Prevents other players from issuing challenges to you.

Control.Text: Prevent other players from viewing your statistics
Control.Name: Text
Control.Tooltip: Prevents other players from viewing your battle statistics, such as recent games played, outcomes, etc.

Control.Name: FilterChallengesButton3
Control.Tooltip: Prevents other players from issuing challenges to you.

Control.Text: Prevent other players from viewing your collection
Control.Name: Text
Control.Tooltip: Prevents other players from seeing what cards you've collected.

Control.Name: FilterChallengesButton4
Control.Tooltip: Prevents other players from issuing challenges to you.

Control.Name: Text
Control.Tooltip: Determines whether battle cry messages are shown in a game. Battle cry messages are small quotes that appear to be said by your character at various points.

Control.Name: Window1
Control.Tooltip: This message is shown when a battle begins, and might be a friendly greeting or a taunt.

Control.Name: Window1
Control.Tooltip: This message is sometimes shown when you make a good play, capturing many of your opponents cards in one turn.

Control.Name: Window1
Control.Tooltip: This messages is displayed when you win a game.

Control.Name: Window1
Control.Tooltip: This message is displayed when your opponent wins a game.

Control.Name: Easy
Control.Tooltip: Challenge an opponent to a game of Eldan Cards!

Control.Text: (Easy) Like taking candy from a baby
Control.Name: Name

Control.Text: An opponent with a deck of a similar strength to your own; your superior brains and skill means they should prove little challenge, though you're less likely to win anything worthwhile.
Control.Name: Description
Art
Control.Tooltip: View your card collection.

Control.Text: An opponent with a stronger deck, this should prove to a be a battle that will test your skill, strength and patience; succeed and you may be able to bag yourself some nice spoils of war.
Control.Name: Description
Hard
Control.Tooltip: Challenge an opponent to a game of Eldan Cards!

Control.Text: An opponent with a powerful deck and the skill to wield it; these opponents will be tough to beat. Rise up to the challenge and you may be able to reap some powerful rewards, or be sent packing in shame.
Control.Name: Description
RefreshButton
Control.Tooltip: Refresh the player listing

Control.Name: FriendsOnlyButton
Control.Tooltip: If ticked, only players who are on your friends list will be displayed

Control.Name: GuildOnlyButton
Control.Tooltip: If ticked, only players who are in your guild will be displayed

Control.Name: CirclesOnlyButton
Control.Tooltip: If ticked, only players who share a common circle with yourself will be displayed

Control.Name: NameFilterContainer
Control.Tooltip: Displays only players whose name partially matches the entered text

Control.Name: Challenge
Control.Tooltip: Issue a challenge to this player.

Control.Name: Whisper
Control.Tooltip: Initiate a whisper to this player.

Control.Name: Collection
Control.Tooltip: View this player's collection.

Control.Name: Stats
Control.Tooltip: View this player's statistics.

Control.Name: CompletionPercentage
Control.Tooltip: This player has completed 100% of the collection.
